title: How to Open a PES File on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://fileviewerplus.com/open/pes in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://fileviewerplus.com/open/pes in a web browser. File Viewer Plus 3 is a free to use program that will let you view PES files on your computer.

steps.title: Click Download Now.
steps.content: Click Download Now . You'll find this in the right side of the browser window. A new page will load and the download will start automatically. You can provide your email if you want to receive tips on using File Browser Plus 3.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . The file will save in the Downloads folder unless you change it.

steps.title: Double-click the .exe file.
steps.content: Double-click the .exe file. You'll most likely find this in the Downloads folder. You may have to allow the program permissions to continue.

steps.title: Follow the File Viewer Plus 3 Setup Wizard.
steps.content: Follow the File Viewer Plus 3 Setup Wizard. Read all agreements before continuing.

steps.title: Open File Viewer Plus 3.
steps.content: Open File Viewer Plus 3. You'll find this in your Start Menu.

steps.title: Click Start Trial.
steps.content: Click Start Trial . You'll have a 14-day free trial, after which the app costs $29.95.

steps.title: Click Open a file.
steps.content: Click Open a file . Your file browser will open.

steps.title: Navigate to and click on your PES file.
steps.content: Navigate to and click on your PES file. Your PES file will open in File Viewer Plus 3.

steps.title: Open the App Store.
steps.content: Open the App Store. You'll find this on your Dock or Applications folder. Login if prompted. You'll be prompted to create an Apple ID if you don't have one.

steps.title: Search “StitchBuddy”.
steps.content: Search “StitchBuddy”. You'll find the search bar in the left of the app window.

steps.title: Tap the search result with the author as Matthias Arndt.
steps.content: Tap the search result with the author as Matthias Arndt.

steps.title: Click Get and Install App.
steps.content: Click Get and Install App . The app will take a few seconds to download to your Mac.

steps.title: Navigate to and click on your PES file.
steps.content: Navigate to and click on your PES file. You can search for this file in Spotlight . Once you click on the file, it will open in StitchBuddy.
